text: $2.10/pc. Generous popiah fillings with very balanced taste - equally delicious with or without chilli! Very neat wrapping as well, which makes it easy to savour each piece in one bite. Will return to eat this again!

Apr'2025- Recent popiah (mend by staff) taste poor especially pass 4wks. The veg taste overcooked soggy and also takeaway home.the popiah are soggy and some days *Shrink in size*. Hope the stall lady owner is aware. Nice owner thou.

Used to buy from this stall for the pass 3years. From $1.80(with chinese lup cheong) increased to $2, to $2.10 & now $2.30. They said lup cheong not popular but its authentic old taste.
Delicious popiah situated at Bishan north estates. The chilli and turnips are favourful than others i have tried!

One popiah is $2.10, inflation..
It’s ok ok for me..not the best and not too bad..
Very underrated popiah! The filings and skin were well done and the chili was excellent! Would come back to this little nook in Bishan to eat it again!
